scripts.build:rs: cd src/caravan-rs && wasm-pack build -t web --out-dir pkg-web && wasm-pack build -t nodejs --out-dir pkg-nodejs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:rs && npm run build:ts && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.copy-wasm: shx mkdir -p dist/caravan-rs/pkg-web && shx mkdir -p dist/caravan-rs/pkg-nodejs && shx cp -r src/caravan-rs/pkg-web/* dist/caravan-rs/pkg-web/ && shx cp -r src/caravan-rs/pkg-nodejs/* dist/caravan-rs/pkg-nodejs/
